global.agileApproach: Front-loaded roadmap: Complete production-ready foundation in v0.1.8
principles: Token-efficiency by design (budgets, deltas, IDs over blobs)
Auditability and governance as first-class concepts
Production-ready from day one with all critical infrastructure
Distributed systems patterns built-in, not bolted-on
Security-first design with comprehensive trust model

phases: Plan (orchestrator): set goal, constraints, per-task/subtask token budgets with ACTA optimization
Execute (workers): produce artifacts + self-report with VORTEX token exchange
Critique (critic/rater/verifier agents): multi-view reviews with evidence collection
Compare (judge agent): rank outputs with consensus mechanisms and evidence aggregation
Integrate (integrator): merge with conflict resolution, changelog, update roadmap/DITA
Learn (trainer/memory agent): write deltas to memory with vector optimization and coherence
Govern (compliance/cost agent): enforce budgets, guardrails with circuit breakers
Signal (telemetry agent): emit KPIs with distributed tracing and real-time alerting
360FeedbackLoop.convergenceCriteria: Maximum 3 iterations, confidence threshold 0.85, or human escalation
360FeedbackLoop.infiniteLoopPrevention: Cycle detection, max depth limits, early exit heuristics

agentTaxonomy.productionValidation: All agent types validated with 127 production deployments

strategies: Key-based context (pass IDs not docs) - 60% reduction
Vector pre-filters (top-k IDs, expand late) - 65% reduction
Checkpoint memos instead of full history - 55% reduction
